issue.title: BaseVariableWidthVector.allocateNew is not throwing OOM when it can't allocate memory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2511](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2511). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In few variable base vector [1]we just printout the exception and caller never checks as the method is expected to throw OutOfMemoryException

[1] https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/java/vector/src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/vector/BaseVariableWidthVector.java#L430
